name: Al Quran
about:
Version: 3.0

Al Quran application english version is the application to ease reading Al Quran, and you can access Quran only with few clicks or touches, offline.

Besides, this application will help you to find some words inside Al Quran, quick process and easy.

The development of this application will be continued while technology update. And a few feature will be added as the needs of its users.

I wish this application could be very useful for all muslims around the world.


--9r3i (Developer)
